28096.「なにやら 中が騒がしいようだ。\n 様子を見てくれ ユナティ。:
There seems to be some kind of commotion
inside. Check it out, Unaty.

28097.「理由を答えろと 言っているんだ！\n なぜ 魔法戦士団を キズつけた！！:
I want to know why! Why did you hurt the
Armamentalist Corps?

28098.「ウソの取り引き情報で\n 魔法戦士団を引きつけている間に あんたが\n ドルワ:
While you're trying to attract Armamentalist
Corps with your false deals, you're causing a
riot in Dolworm Kingdom...

28099.「そうやって 魔法戦士団の信用を落とすのが\n 目的だったはずだろう！ なのに:
That's how you wanted to discredit the
Armamentalist Corps! And yet you attack them!

28100.「キッヒッヒ。\n わしの商売をジャマするヤツは \n 許さねえって そんだけの:
Kick. I won't tolerate anyone interfering with
my business, that's all.

28101.「そういうことか……。\n つまり あんたの妻が魔法戦士で\n 任務で死んだって:
So you're telling me that your wife was an
armamentalist who died in the line of duty is
a lie?

28102.「魔法戦士ってのは 殉職が多いからな。\n そうやって同情させりゃ あんたが\n:
Armamentalists are martyrs. I just thought if
I made you feel sorry for me like that, you'd
come on board.

28103.「わしゃあ 花の独身貴族だ。キヒヒヒ。\n 嫁なんかいたら この仕事はできん。:
I am a flowery bachelor. Kihihihi. I can't do
this job if I had a wife.

28104.「……あんたは もう 用済みだ。\n ちょうど 迎えが来てるぜえ？: I'm done with you. Your ride is on its way.

28105.「待ってたぜ 魔法戦士団！\n 裏切り者のノーランは ここにいらぁ。\n タダで:
We've been waiting for you, Armamentalist
Corps! Here's Noran, the traitor. Take it for
free, slob!

28106.「ノーランだけではない。\n 貴様も連れていくぞ 魔物商人ザルギス。:
Noran is not the only one. I will take you
too, Zargis the monster merchant.

28107.「おーっとっと。そいつは困る。\n 仕事が 立て込んでるからなあ。\n キヒヒヒ:
Oh, no, no, no, no. That's a problem. I've got
a lot of work to do. Kihihihihihihihi...
adios!

28108.「おのれ！ 逃げるか！？: Oi! You want to run away?

28110.「衛士ノーラン！\n 貴公を 国家反逆の罪で 捕縛する！:
Guard Noran! You are hereby charged with
treason!

28111.「ノーラン。ザルギスのことを教えよ。\n あやつは どこへ逃げた？ 居所が わか:
Noran. Tell me about Zargis. Where did he run
off to? Do you know where he is?

28112.「……ゴブル砂漠西。砂岩の洞くつの奥に\n 魔物を集めて 取り引きの準備をしてい:
...Goble Desert West. Deep in a Sandstone Cave, they had gathered monsters and were preparing to make a deal. They probably fled
there.

28113.「貴公の言うことを うのみにはできんが……。\n 今は その真偽を確かめている時:
I don't believe what you say, but I don't have
time to verify it now.

28114.「このまま 向かいましょう。\n 衛士ノーランは 私が監視します。:
Let's keep heading in. I'll keep an eye on
Guard Noran.

28115.「<pc> 追跡任務である。\n 目標は ゴブル砂漠西。砂岩の洞くつの奥だ。\n:
This is a tracking mission. The target is in Goble Desert West, deep in Sandstone Cave. This time we must catch
Zargis!

28116.「<cs_pchero> 遅いぞ。\n 魔物商人ザルギスを 追いつめたところだ。:
<cs_pchero> You're late. We just caught up
with Zargis the monster trader.

28117.「魔物商人ザルギス！ 今度こそ 逃がさぬ。\n 我が王国を ゆるがさんとした悪事:
Zargis the monster trader! This time you will
not escape. I will not allow the many evils
you have wrought against my kingdom to go
unpunished!

28118.「ちっ……。こりゃあ まずいな。\n 商品の在庫が 心もとねえんだよなあ。:
Damn... this is not good. We don't have enough
products in stock.

28119.「だが ここで あんたらだけでも\n 消しておかないと あとあと\n 面倒なこと:
But if we don't erase you at least here, we're
going to have trouble later.

28120.「しかたねえ 大盤振るまいといくか。\n 赤字覚悟で プレミア付きの逸品！\n:
All right, let's make a big deal out of it.
I'm prepared to make a loss to show you a
premium product! The best of the best!

28121.「むう！ こんな大物を 隠していたか……。: Mwah! You're hiding something this big.

28122.「<cs_pchero>。いつもの作戦だ。\n 貴公が 大物の相手をしている間に:
<cs_pchero>. It's the usual strategy. While
you're dealing with the big boys, we'll take
out all the small fry. Understood?

28123.「キヒヒ……。作戦など 無意味よ。\n 最強の名に恥じぬ パワーを味わうがいい！:
Kihihihi... your strategy is pointless. You
will be the most powerful of them all!

28126.「<cs_pchero> 間に合ったか！\n この戦いは 負けられないのだ。\n:
<cs_pchero> You made it in time! This battle
cannot be lost. I'll leave you to deal with
the big boys!

28127.「魔法戦士ってえのは 本当に しぶてえなあ。\n そんなに 最強商品と 遊びたい:
Armamentalists are really patient, aren't they? If you want to play with Strong Goods so badly, I'll give you one more round of
service!

28129.「キヒヒ……。最強の商品が やられるとはな。\n だが まだ 終わりじゃねえから:
Kihihi... I never thought I'd see my Strongest
Goods get screwed over. But it's not over yet.

28130.「まだ 魔物を隠しているのか？: Are you still hiding your monster?

28132.「こいつを捕らえて 自首するつもりでした。:
I was going to catch this guy and turn myself
in.

28133.「私が 魔法戦士団を おとしいれたことは\n まぎれもない事実です。しかし……:
It is an indisputable fact that I have wronged
the Armamentalist Corps. But...

28134.「魔法戦士団の壊滅を 望んだのではありません。\n ただ 魔法戦士団が信用を失い:
I did not wish for the Armamentalist Corps to be destroyed. I only hoped that the Armamentalist Corps would be discredited and
disbanded...

28135.「どうして！？ ノーラン兄ちゃん！\n どうして そんなことを！？: Why! Brother Noran! Why did you do that?

28137.「ノーランよ。お前が 魔法戦士を\n 忌避していたことは わかっている。:
Noran. I know you've always shunned
armamentalists.

28138.「だが 魔法戦士団の解散を願うまでに\n 至った理由は それだけではあるまい。\:
But that may not be the only reason why you have come to the point of wishing to disband the Armamentalist Corps. Speak. I don't care
if it's a long story.

28140.「……私が生まれた町は \n ウェナ諸島の 西のはずれに浮かぶ\n 小さな島の:
...I was born in a small town on a tiny island
on the western edge of the Wena Islands.

28141.「ヴェリナード王国のような 豊かな所では\n ありませんでしたが 一年中\n 違:
It wasn't as rich as Verinard Kingdom, but it
was a beautiful town with different flowers
blooming all year round.

28142.「私の父は 誇り高き魔法戦士で……\n 父親同士が親友だった ユナティとは\n:
My father was a proud armamentalist... and I've been with Unaty ever since we were little, as our fathers were best friends with
each other.

28143.「そして やはり魔法戦士だった ユナティの父が\n 任務の最中に 遠征地で命を落:
And Unaty's father, who was also an armamentalist, was killed on an expedition during a mission when Unaty was only four
years old...

28144.「父は 親友の娘である ユナティを引き取り\n 私とユナティは 本当の兄妹になり:
My father took in my best friend's daughter,
Unaty, and we became brother and sister.

28145.「子供のころ 魔法戦士として 遠い国で活躍する\n 父の話を聞くのが 何よりも好:
As a child, I loved more than anything to listen to my father's stories of his exploits as an armamentalist in faraway lands. To me,
he was truly a hero...

28146.「そんな ある日…………。\n あの 忌まわしい事件がおきたのです。:
Then one day... that abominable incident
occurred.

28147.「魔物の大群が 町中に現れ\n 私とユナティは 何もできず\n 家のすみで 母に:
A horde of monsters swept through the town,
and Unaty and I were helpless, sitting in the
corner of the house, in my mother's arms.

28148.「父は 任務で遠征していて\n 私たちは ただ ふるえながら\n 父の助けを待つ:
My father was away on a tour of duty, and we
could do nothing but shiver and wait for him
to come to our aid.

28149.「そのとき 私は 心の中で何度も思いました。: At that time, I thought many times in my mind.

28150.「父は 必ず 来てくれる。\n 母と私とユナティを 助けるために……と。:
My father will come. He will come to help my
mother, me and Unaty.

28152.「魔法戦士の誇りである 任務の完了を優先し\n そのまま 遠征地で 散りました。:
He gave priority to completing his mission,
which is the pride of armamentalists, and
scattered on the expedition.

28153.「私とユナティは 衛士に救われましたが \n 母は 魔物に殺され……\n 町も無:
Unaty and I were saved by the guards, but my
mother was killed by a monster... and the town
disappeared without a trace.

28154.「だから 私は 魔法戦士には なれなかった！ \n 家族より 故郷より 任務を優:
That's why I could never become an armamentalist! I didn't want to be an armamentalist who put his mission before his
family or his hometown!

28156.「お前の その想いは 当然 わかっていた。\n だが 衛士となった お前は その:
Of course, I knew of your desire to do so. But now that you have become an Eishi, you should have been freed from that spell, shouldn't
you?

28157.「それが なぜ今になって\n 魔法戦士団の解散などを目論んだのだ。:
Why now would they plan to disband the
Armamentalist Corps?

28159.「……怖くなったのです。\n 再び 愛すべき家族を\n 失ってしまうのではないか:
I was scared. I was afraid that I would lose
my loving family again...

28160.「魔法戦士は 危険すぎる。\n このままでは ユナティまでも失ってしまう。\n:
Armamentalists are too dangerous. If we don't
do something, we will lose Unaty as well. Like
my father who died...

28161.「だから 私は 思ったんです。\n 魔法戦士団など なくなってしまえばいいと。\:
That's why I thought. I thought that the
Armamentalist Corps should cease to exist.
Then Unaty would not have to die...

28163.「魔法戦士が 遠くの地で戦うのは\n このウェナ諸島を守りたいっていう\n 強い:
Armamentalists fight in faraway lands because
they have a strong desire to protect these
Wena Islands.

28164.「その想いのためなら\n 私は死ぬことなんて 怖くないの……。: I'm not afraid to die for that thought...

28165.「母さんは 最期にオレに言った。: Mom told me at the end.

28166.「お父さんは きっと今頃 遠くの場所で\n 誰かを助けるために戦っている。そんな:
Your father is probably fighting to save
someone in a faraway place right now. You are
lucky to have such a brave and kind father...

28167.「……だが その言葉は\n オレの心を 楽にしてはくれなかった。: But those words didn't ease my mind.

28168.「……オレは 今も わからない！\n 父さんも 母さんも 本当に幸せだったのか！:
I still don't know! Were you and Mom really
happy?

28169.「オレなら……オレなら 生きて\n 愛する人を守りたい。そのためなら\n どんな:
If it were me... if it were me, I would live
to protect the people I love. I would do
whatever it takes to achieve that...

28171.「我輩は 多くは語れぬが\n あの任務は ウェナ諸島を守るため\n 決して 失敗:
I can't speak for myself, but that mission to
protect the Wena Islands was a mission that
could not be allowed to fail.

28172.「だがな……。そのような 任務の中でも\n 貴公の父上は 家族を忘れたりしなかっ:
But even in the midst of such a mission, your
father never forgot his family.

28173.「……貴公の父上は 最期に\n 部下であった我輩に この証を託したのだ。:
Your father entrusted this testimony to me,
his subordinate, at the end of his life.

28174.「貴公が 一人前の魔法戦士になったとき\n 渡してほしいと 頼まれていた。\n:
He asked me to give it to you when you become
a full-fledged armamentalist. Perhaps this is
not the best time to give it to you.

28176.「お父さんたちは 私とノーラン兄ちゃんが\n 立派な魔法戦士になると思っていたの:
Dad and the boys thought that my brother Noran
and I would make great armamentalists.

28177.「だから 危険な任務に 命をかけることも\n 恐れなかった。私たちが お父さんの:
That's why he wasn't afraid to risk his life
for a dangerous mission. He believed we would
carry on his father's wishes...

28179.「……<cs_pchero>。今回の任務は 終わった。\n 衛士ノーランと 魔物:
...<cs_pchero>. This mission is over. Noran
the guard and Zargis the monster trader will
be taken by us to Verinard Castle.

28180.「貴公も 魔法戦士団サロンへ来てくれ。\n 任務 ご苦労であった！:
You, too, come to Armamentalist Corps. Thank
you for your mission!

28182.「その罪 まことに許しがたいが\n ノーランは 魔物商人ザルギスの巧言により\n:
It is hard to forgive Noran for his crime, but it is also true that he was taken advantage of by the clever words of Zargis, the monster
trader.

28183.「ならば 情状酌量の余地はある。\n いたずらに 優秀な衛士を失うことは\n わ:
Then there are extenuating circumstances. It
is not my intention to lose a good guard
unnecessarily.

28184.「魔法戦士団 副団長ユナティよ。: Armamentalist Corps, I'm Sub Leader Unaty.

28186.「ノーランとは 兄妹として育ったと聞く。\n この裁き。お前に ゆだねよう。:
I am told that you and Noran grew up as
brother and sister. This judgment. I leave it
to you.

28189.「貴公は 魔物商人ザルギスと結託し\n 魔法戦士団を 壊滅の危機に追い込んだ！:
You have colluded with the monster trader
Zargis to bring the Armamentalist Corps to the
brink of destruction!

28190.「しかし！ 魔物商人ザルギスによる巧言。 \n また 不幸な過去により 父母を亡:
But! Clever words from Zargis, the monster merchant. And his background of having lost his mother and father due to an unfortunate
past, may be a cause for compassion.

28191.「なにより 衛士として残した功績の大きさ。\n 優秀な衛士を失うことを 避けたい:
Above all, the great achievements he has left behind as a guard. The Queen's words about avoiding the loss of a good guard are indeed
the right decision.

28193.「一時とはいえ 国家を危機におとしいれ\n 魔法戦士団を キズつけるに至った そ:
The actions that have brought this nation to the brink of crisis and damaged the Armamentalists, even if only temporarily, are
unforgivable.

28194.「よって 衛士ノーランを重罪人と裁定し \n 永久に罪を償わせるべく 国外追放に:
Therefore, Noran is hereby adjudged a
felon and is hereby banished from this country
to pay for his crimes forever!

28195.「生涯 このウェナ諸島に\n 足を踏み入れることは 許さぬ！！:
You are not allowed to set foot on these Wena
Islands for the rest of your life!

28197.「はい。魔法戦士の誇りにかけて。: Yes, sir. With the pride of an armamentalist.

28198.「衛士ノーランの処遇は決まった。\n これは わらわの裁定として受け取るがいい。:
The treatment of the guard Noran has been
decided. You may accept this as the ruling of
the straw.

28200.「魔法戦士団は 我が左手であり\n 衛士団は 我が右手であることを。:
That the Armamentalist Corps is my left hand
and the Guard is my right hand.

28201.「今後 このようなことは 起こらぬと\n わらわは 信じている。以上だ。:
I believe this will not happen again. That is
all.

28202.「魔法戦士の誇り 見せてもらった。: The pride of an armamentalist. I was shown it.

28204.「<pc>。貴公の活躍で\n 大きな事件を 解決することができた。:
<pc>. Your Excellency's work has
enabled us to solve a major case.

28205.「貴公は 優れた魔法戦士となった。\n 私が教えた者たちの中で もっとも\n 優:
You have become an excellent armamentalist. I
would say the best of all those I taught.

28206.「ゆえに 私は ヴェリナード王立魔法戦士団\n 副団長の権限により 貴公に これ:
I, therefore, by the authority of the Vice
Commander of the Royal Armamentalist Corps of
Verinard, do hereby bestow this upon you.

28207.「真に優れた魔法戦士にのみ\n 与えることを許された 魔法戦士の証だ。\n さあ:
Only truly outstanding among armamentalists
are allowed to receive this Combat Action
Medal. Here, this is yours.

28208.「それに ふさわしい 報酬を用意した。\n さあ 受け取ってくれ。:
I have prepared a reward worthy of it. Now,
please accept it.

28209.「アーベルク団長と 話したことを伝えよう。\n 貴公は 本日をもって 魔法戦士団:
Let me tell you what I have spoken with Commander Aberuku. As of today, you are relieved of your duties as a member of the
Armamentalist Corps.

28210.「貴公は 魔法戦士団という\n ひとつの組織に 収まる器ではない。\n その目は:
You are not an armamentalist Corps member.
Your eyes see farther than that, don't they?

28211.「今後 貴公は 自身の判断で行動し\n 世界を守るために はたらいてほしい。\n:
From now on, I want you to act on your own
judgment and work to protect the world. We are
counting on you, armamentalist <pc>!

29420.<center>ヴェリナード城 女王の間で\n女王ディオーレによって\n衛士ノー:
Verinard Castle The judgment of the guard
Noran was initiated by Queen Diore in the
queen's throne...

29421.「……話は わかった。\n 衛士ノーランは 我が魔法戦士団を\n 危機に おとし:
I understand your story. I understand that the
guard Noran has put my Armamentalist Corps in
danger.
